title: 'The fragrance does not last as claimed. Maybe a fake product'
body: 'i have always been using nivea deodorant for a longtime now. this product could be fake as the scent does not last even an hour. earlier also i have ordered from amazon and that nivea deodorant was absolutely spot on even though been used in summers. but this one failed badly giving 90% chances of it being a fake product.'

title: Don't last long
body: It's adjustable to skin but it never last long. Most of the time I couldn't believe that I sprayed it... There was like no smell. The fragrance went so fast... Like in 30 seconds of spraying.
